TopicTitle: In VAB stage delta V shows up in the decoupler stage, not the engine stage

Articles.Content:
As the topic title indicates, when in the VAB and looking at all the stage info the delta-V for the Stage 2 motor shows up listed with the decoupler in the stage below. This might not be a factor if we could combine decouplers with the motors above them into a single stage, but as we know there is a decoupler bug that forces us to keep the decouplers in their own stage or risk towing spent empty stages behind us forever. En if it were not for this bug, some might prefer to have the decoupler in it's own stage so that they can control the start of the motor separately form the staging event that jetisons the lower stage.

Expected bahavior: delta-V is listed in the same stage with the motor that provides it.
